function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of viral transmission in densely populated buildings due to lack of ventilation and proximity","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease spread and prolonged outbreaks within residential buildings","Mitigation":"Implement better air ventilation systems with antimicrobial materials and touchless technologies","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems, antimicrobial coatings, touchless sensors","People":"Residents, building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Architects, building developers, facility management"},{"Description":"Inadequate sanitation and hygiene measures leading to contamination and disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of infectious disease transmission within buildings and communities","Mitigation":"Use hygienic building materials that are easy to sanitize and implement improved water and wastewater management","Technologies":"Antimicrobial materials, easy-to-sanitize surfaces, advanced water and wastewater treatment systems","People":"Residents, building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Architects, building developers, facility management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"High density of people in buildings leading to elevated risk of prolonged self-isolation and mental health issues","Impact":"Increased stress, anxiety, and mental health challenges due to prolonged self-isolation in densely populated buildings","Mitigation":"Promote low-rise buildings with greener spaces, better air quality, and self-sufficient strategies to reduce density and improve mental well-being","Technologies":"Low-rise building designs, green space integration, improved indoor air quality systems","People":"Residents, building occupants, community members","Owner":"Urban planners, architects, building developers, community leaders, public health authorities"}]}
